name: df-rngisom
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(crngs, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, crab(s2, co(cv(s0), crngh, cv(s1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s2)), co(cv(s1), crngh, cv(s0))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ RngIsom =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { s2 ∈(s0[RngHomo]s1)| `' s2 ∈(s1[RngHomo]s0)})
comment: Define the set of non-unital ring isomorphisms from ` r ` to ` s ` . (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2020.)
